Message:
While fighting against
a cursed creature,
I got distracted by
the sight of her and
suffered a deep wound.

She rushes to apply pressure
to the wound as I bleed out.
I can’t believe I’m gettin’ saved by
the very person I’m tryin’ to kill...

Glaring up at her,
I realized that her eyes
were different than before.

As though resisting fate itself,
her eyes shine like
she isn’t ready to die yet...

Ahh, now’s my chance.
My chance...to kill her...

...Huh? How strange.
I can’t muster any strength
in my body, and my head
feels all fuzzy.

Must be ’cause
I lost so much blood...
If Big Sis saw me now,
I’m sure she’d be mad...

I have to kill her...
before her eyes change...

She...keeps saying something
over and over again...

I feel like...
I’ve heard those words
somewhere before...
But where...?
